FuncDef: The reset mpls te gmpls tunnel command restarts specified GMPLS UNI tunnels.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the GMPLS UNI tunnel.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters, spaces not supported. The value must start with a letter and cannot contain a slash (/).

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset mpls te gmpls tunnel toRT2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset mpls te gmpls tunnel command can be run in the user view to trigger the reestablishment of GMPLS UNI tunnels.
